name: Super Ledgehop: Double Laser
description: Cutie anime girl realizes her cool big bro is missing?? Cheese it up with Chizuru and SHOOT TO THE BEAT OF THE SONG in this top down bullet hell shooter! Absorb enemy bullets using your waveshines to utilize their bullets as your own! Show those cheeseheads that you're better!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 500 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 800 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
